mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_weather_data (city_id,city_name,temperature, pressure, humidity,wind_speed,wind_direction_name, wind_direction,weather_name, weather, collect_time,create_date) VALUES (#{cityId},#{cityName},#{temperature},#{pressure},#{humidity},#{windSpeed},#{windDirectionName},#{windDirection},#{weatherName},#{weather},#{collectTime},now())
